citations.narrative:
Space. Insufficient space was being provided to 25 weanling guinea pigs in Row 3, middle enclosure on the right side.
This enclosure measured 47 inches long by 24 inches wide or 1128 square inches of floor space. Weanlings weighing up
to 350 grams require at least 60 square inches of floor space per animal. Can not house more than 18 weanlings in this
size enclosure.
Insufficient space can cause stress and increase aggression in animals which can increase bites, scratches, ear chewing,
and other injuries. Licensee must ensure that guinea pigs are provided with at least the minimum amount of floor space
per animal to prevent overcrowding and aggression.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(c)(1)(iii)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
Space. Insufficient space was being provided to 25 weanling guinea pigs in Row 3, middle enclosure on the right side. 
This enclosure measured 47 inches long by 24 inches wide or 1128 square inches of floor space. Weanlings weighing up 
to 350 grams require at least 60 square inches of floor space per animal. Can not house more than 18 weanlings in this 
size enclosure.  
 
Insufficient space can cause stress and increase aggression in animals which can increase bites, scratches, ear chewing, 
and other injuries. Licensee must ensure that guinea pigs are provided with at least the minimum amount of floor space 
per animal to prevent overcrowding and aggression. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
